section.title: Command List for quantum CLI
section.literallayout:
Usage: quantum [OPTIONS] <command> [args]
Options: -h, --help show this help message and exit -H HOST, --host=HOST ip address of api host -p PORT, --port=PORT api poort -s, --ssl use ssl --debug print debugging output -f LOGFILE, --logfile=LOGFILE log file path -t TOKEN, --token=TOKEN authentication token --version=VERSION Accepts 1.1 and 1.0, defaults to env[QUANTUM_VERSION].
